review: I like this unit, and would have given it more starts if it wasn't for one major thing - we have Prime, and the main screen sorts options and states "watch free with Prime." You click on it and the default selection is to PAY. You have to move the cursor and click through 2 more screens in order to actually watch for free. Even if it knows you're logged in with Prime. It should default to the free option if a Prime account owner chooses to watch something that is free, but it doesn't. We got hit with a few charges before we even realized this was happening. Very sneaky, if you ask me.Also, the batteries in the remote die FAST. We just keep a package of batteries near the TV for quick replacement. Amazon needs to work on an auto-off mode when not using the remote.
